screen_desc: This screenshot displays a sponsored section from an online platform, promoting iPads on eBay. It features three different iPads: a refurbished model for $159.99, a 2021 iPad Pro for $1,099.95, and a Wi-Fi version for $275. The products are listed with the seller name, storage details, and ratings for each. The options have a "View more" button to explore additional listings.
action_think: The user has been shown a page with various iPads listed, including prices for new and refurbished models. The next step is to click on the 'View more' button to explore more listings and possibly find new iPads for sale. The information on this page primarily shows refurbished and older models, but the user requested the cost of a 'new iPad.' So, to proceed, I need to view additional results to find relevant pricing for new iPads.
action_plan: Click on the 'View more' button under the 'Like New Refurbished iPad' product to explore more listings of iPads.
Look for new iPads in the additional listings.
action_desc: Click on the 'View more' button under the 'Like New Refurbished iPad' product.
action_result:
By clicking on the result link "Apple iPads - Tablets & eReaders" at the bottom of the screen, the web browser navigated to the iPad listings on eBay's website. The current screenshot displays the top portion of the eBay page for Apple iPads where users can shop by popular models.

This action has made progress towards the user request, which is to find out how much the new iPad costs on eBay, because it has taken the user from a general search result page to the specific category page for Apple iPads on eBay. From here, the user can browse the available models to find pricing for new iPads.
